# tf.contrib.framework.prepend_name_scope

``` python
prepend_name_scope(
    name,
    import_scope
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.4/tensorflow/python/framework/ops.py).

Prepends name scope to a name.

#### Args:

* <b>`name`</b>: A `string` name.
* <b>`import_scope`</b>: Optional `string`. Name scope to add.


#### Returns:

Name with name scope added, or the original name if import_scope
is None.
